description: A Terms and Conditions agreement acts as a legal contract between you (the company) and the user. It's where you maintain your rights to exclude users from your app in the event that they abuse your website/app, set out the rules for using your service and note other important details and disclaimers..
summary: Right to make changes to the agreement.

content: We will need the candidate's email,phone(optional),sex,birthdate,first name and last name in order to identify the candidate to proceed to the  next registration step.
The above user details will be removed once the candidature is rejected
When the candidate is selected, his/her data will be kept for tracking candidature history and profile creation.

content: The app's security complies with the OWASP mobile apps security verification standard
